test.name: cenário 1: abrir navegador colocar login e senha e clicar em entrar

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The geckodriver version (0.35.0) detected in PATH at C:\WINDOWS\geckodriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected firefox version (139.0.1); currently, geckodriver 0.36.0 is recommended for firefox 139.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.
